data.title: Pacers Sign Veteran Free Agent Monta Ellis
data.meta_description: INDIANAPOLIS – The Indiana Pacers announced Tuesday they have signed veteran free agent Monta Ellis to a contract. Per club policy terms of the contract were not released. "He’ll be a great addition to our team," said Pacers President of Basketball Operations Larry Bird. "And he fits our needs for how we want to play. We’re excited to have him. He adds another veteran in our lineup and we think he'll be a great fit, complementing George Hill in the back court."
